ComicInfo.Series: Dark Nights: Death Metal The Last 52: War of the Multiverses
ComicInfo.Summary:
Fight! [Part 2]: As Wonder Woman faces off against the Darkest Knight, the Darkest Knight tries to convince Wonder Woman of the hopelessness of the situation, but Wonder Woman draws upon a childhood memory to strengthen her resolve to fight.
Reign of the Swamp King: Swamp Thing leads a team of "monsters" against his Dark Multiverse counterpart, the Swamp King.
Armageddon Blues: In the midst of the battle against the Dark Multiverse, John Constantine is confronted by his Dark Multiverse counterpart, and they decide to leave the battle to go have a drink.
Apicius: Penguin faces horrific versions of himself from the Dark Multiverse, and is determined to do whatever he has to do to survive.
Falling Through the Cracks: Raven must lead the Teen Titans against their counterparts from the Dark Multiverse, who are led by a dark version of herself.
No More Superheroes: Lois Lane is confronted by her Dark Multiverse counterpart, who has killed Superman and the other heroes on her Earth, and wants to do the same thing in the regular Multiverse.
Unstable Atoms: As Ryan Choi, Mister Terrific, and Will Magnus prepare to launch a plan against the Dark Multiverse utilizing the Metal Men, Ryan is confronted by his Dark Multiverse counterpart.
The Batmen Who Laugh: Batman leads the Bat Family against the Dark Knights, versions of Batman from the Dark Multiverse. The corpse of the Batman Who Laughs, resurrected by Batman using a Black Lantern ring to fight against the Dark Multiverse armies, turns against Batman unexpectedly, but Batman is prepared for him.
First & Last Men: Superman and the Super Family battle four Dark Multiverse versions of Superman. Superman's villains join the heroes to turn the tide against the Dark Supermen.
Fight!: Wonder Woman leads the heroes and villains against The Darkest Knight and their counterparts from the Dark Multiverse.
